description: Starter schema for Quranic research corpus (verse–token–annotation).

fields.surah: object        # surah info: {number: int, name: string (Arabic)}
fields.ayah: int            # ayah number within the surah
fields.text: string         # original Arabic text as stored
fields.text_norm: string?    # optional: normalized text (e.g. stripped diacritics)

fields.id: int             # token id within the verse (1-based)
fields.form: string        # surface form as it appears in text
fields.lemma: string?      # dictionary form if you use one
fields.features: object      # key–value map for extra features (e.g. gender, number)
fields.gloss: string?      # short gloss if you choose to add one later

fields.target_token_ids: int[] # which tokens this applies to (empty if scope = "verse")
fields.tags: string[]      # free tags you define, e.g. ["teaching", "ibrahim"]
fields.author: string?      # optional: your name or initials
